text: John Richard Anthony Scott-Oldfield (born 1933), is a male former athlete who competed for England. ==Athletics career== He represented England in the 220 yards race at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Cardiff, Wales. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:English male sprinters Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Living people
title: John Scott-Oldfield
